id: scenario-value-scanner-teen-scenarios-family-teen coordinates her schedule with family needs
title: Teen coordinates her schedule with family needs
description: Teen coordinates her schedule with family needs
content:
Scenario: Teen coordinates her schedule with family needs
    Given Jasmine works part-time with variable hours
    And the family has commitments that require coordination
    And Jordan needs after-school supervision
    When Jasmine's work schedule is set
    Then her personal_agent should communicate with family_elohim
    And flag potential conflicts: "Jordan needs supervision Tuesday 3-6pm"
    And help Jasmine balance her work commitments with family responsibilities
    And recognize her care contributions when she adjusts her schedule for family
    And support the family in coordinating across multiple schedules
    And demonstrate that family functioning requires mutual care and flexibility
